text:
The JavaCC 4.0 has included a new option (NODE_EXTENDS) for the JJTree utility.
This option isn't suported by the 'jjtree' optional task.

You can read about it at:
https://javacc.dev.java.net/doc/jjtreereleasenotes.html

--8<-------8<-------8<-------8<-------8<-------8<-------8<-----
======================================
Changes in 4.0
======================================
New option NODE_EXTENDS to specify a classname that 
SimpleNode extends so that boiler plate code can be  put
in that class. See the examples/Interpreter for an example
usage.
--8<-------8<-------8<-------8<-------8<-------8<-------8<-----
creator: davdela@iiia.csic.es
